TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadFileCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadFileCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type UploadFileCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadFileCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Stellt die Methode zur Behandlung des -Ereignisses eines -Objekts dar.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Beim Erstellen eines -Delegaten bestimmen Sie die Methode für die Ereignisbehandlung.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Um dem Ereignishandler das Ereignis zuzuordnen, fügen Sie dem Ereignis eine Instanz des Delegaten hinzu.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Der Ereignishandler wird bei jedem Eintreten des Ereignisses aufgerufen, sofern der Delegat nicht entfernt wird.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Weitere Informationen zu Ereignishandlerdelegaten finden Sie unter [behandeln und Auswerfen von Ereignissen](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird das asynchrone Hochladen einer Datei veranschaulicht.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a file. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#6)] Die folgende Methode wird aufgerufen, wenn der Upload abgeschlossen ist.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#7)]
